{"price":1088,"description":"Apart from its compact design, Havells Oro Dry Iron provides a good example on how smooth your ironing experience can be. Thedry ironhasTeflon PTFE coated soleplate that makes sure your clothes will not stick to the plate due to overheating.A user can move the plate with sheer comfort on any clothing material.Ironing the toughest creases of your garments can be now done at ease with this advanced iron from Havells. It has 1000 W power consumption and 230 V is the minimum requirement for proper operation. Thermal Fuse has also been incorporated that cuts off the power if any probability of overheating comes in.The 360 Degree Swivel Cord makes it super convenient to iron clothes. When you are on an ironing session for quite a long time, this cord of this dry iron will let your palm and wrist to move freely. A one stop-shop for home decor and furniture, Pepperfry sells a home product every 30 seconds.","companyName":"Havells","productName":"Havells Oro Dry Iron 1000 Watts","productId":105}
